reviews.review: Infrequent patches/game-breaking changes which fosters a healthy competitive atmosphere. Game mechanics are solid, and the game has a high skill cap. Worst thing has to be cheaters, though. By far. Since becoming free it has definitely gotten worse. Realistically though, the people with expensive cheats would have been cheating before anyways, so if you are playing something like FACEIT it's still similar to old matchmaking. All around a great game.

Don't play this game, jesus christ, please. It's atrocious, it's less of a game and more like a really uninteresting technical skill you have to learn. The actual game itself is not enough to learn how to play. You have to watch videos and comb through forums of csgo players being rude and unhelpful to find info on things that are important to the game actually working correctly. You can't unlock anything cool without paying for it, and 90% of players are assholes. 2/10 would not recommend. I play literally only because my friends do, and i really enjoy telling people from the other team that they're nerds for playing counterstrike
